Articles.Content: Apparently only scientist in the MPL now count. Luckily it looks like the boosted the science per scientist to about 3x. IE if you used to have 6 level 1 scientist you now only need 2 and you get the same science per day. I wonder if you can have multiple MPLs now

Ah, thanky, just wanted to open a new thread to ask about the changes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Funny, all this time it felt - and was communicated as such - more like a feature! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Alright everyone, tell us what you know! My mothership is probably obsolete now before its big Duna mission.
I foresee lots of kerbal scientist getting laid off now. I currently have 3 bases with about 10 scientist between them. I guess I can keep 2 for rotations.

Nuts. My Minmus lab is attached to the MK3 passenger module. 18 scientists of crew.

OTOH, it was definitely OP. It produced over 25 science per day.
